about.title: About
about.text:
Humanitarian aid center «Volonter-68» started working in Kharkiv since full scale invasion began. Every single day within this horrific year we help those who need it, we help people who have hard times. And we are not going to stop helping! This is why we really need your help.

Our care receivers are elderly people, people with disabilities, large families, bedridden patients, lonely old men and women and other people who need urgent evacuation out of shelling.

We help these people with:

  1. Evacuation. Over 1000 people including limited mobility and bedridden people have already been evacuated to safe places. We have two special purpose vehicles for transportation and a great and caring team.
  2. Targeted social aid. Food sets, diapers, medicine, pet food - we provided over 80 thousands of food sets and aid kits. We also provide health care workers who can cope with different tasks from bandaging to assistance with payment processing.

We cooperate with volunteers initiative groups and charity funds from Ukraine and worldwide. Everyone in Ukraine has to know that none is abandoned. We are here to help you.

directions.title: Areas of help
directions.subtitle: We help people who are in critical situations. We help those who need it. We help people desperately looking for assistance and support.

content.text:
EVACUATION

We’ll be there for you on your way to a safe place:

  • we evacuate anyone, including limited mobility people and people with disabilities;
  • find long-term accommodation in safe places in Ukraine or abroad;
  • find route;
  • buy tickets;
  • guide people to buses and trains;
  • cooperate in a close contact with all participants of evacuation chain;
  • take care of safety and comfort.

TARGETED SOCIAL AID

We help people who have hard times: elderly people, people with disabilities, large families, vulnerable social groups.

​We deliver:

  • food sets;
  • household chemical goods;
  • diapers for kids and adults;
  • baby food;
  • personal care goods;
  • pet food.

PATRONAGE

For those who misses health care being on territories with evacuated medical and social establishments we:

  • help to get to nearest medical centers for check-up and specialist’s consultation;
  • provide with mobility means: crutches, walkers for adults, wheelchairs;
  • assistance in getting pension payments and social payments;
  • provide nursing services: bandaging etc.

SHELTER «UNLIMITED»

A temporary shelter for individuals with disabilities with 24/7 care

  • Rehabilitation, including medical support;
  • Addressing social issues, including document recovery, pension acquisition, and finding permanent residency;

messages.content: Усі гроші буде витрачено на закупівлю адресної допомоги та забезпечення роботи організації (паливо, амортизація автівок).
messages.title: Help us
messages.text: Money will be spent for buying targeted social aid goods and support of center work (fuel, car amortization).

messages.title: We’ll be pleased to forward from you to people:
messages.medicine: medicine, household chemical goods, personal care goods;
messages.mobility: mobility means for limited mobility people;
messages.alternative: alternative energy means: generators, accumulators, flashlights, batteries.

messages.title: We’ll be grateful if you can:
messages.transport: transport evacuated people in city and region with your own car;
messages.accompany: accompany colleagues during above mentioned trips: help with limited ability people, communicate, load goods;
messages.help: help with administration of the office.
messages.text: It’s up to you how much time you are ready to spend volunteering! We’ll sincerely appreciate any help of yours.

messages.work: Our work would not be possible without the support of donations from many people and organizations in Ukraine and abroad.

content: The project «Evacuation of people with inclusion» is a project for the evacuation of civilians with physical limitations from under fire by ambulances.
The project «Providing targeted humanitarian aid to the disabled, the elderly and people with physical limitations».
«Pikluvalnytsia» project of medical and social patronage of people with inclusion who need external care and assistance and who live in places of compact accommodation of refugees in hostels.
Project «Safety for Children» Training for children and teenagers on the skills of first aid and mine and explosive safety
The Dignity and Safety Project is a temporary shelter for people with physical limitations with 35 beds, where they are cared for 24\7.
«Rehabilitation center for people with disabilities called «Dream in action» with provision of permanent stay and rehabilitation and medical care» for 70 beds.
Project «Invataxi» social transportation of people with disabilities in wheelchairs (to the bank, to state institutions, etc.)

The «60+ Active» project is a project to create a network of centers in the communities of Kharkiv and the region of active women from the number of women aged 60+ for mutual assistance and combating sexual harassment.
Project «Prophylactic» on the organization of medical support and accommodation of persons with disabilities in the sanatorium «Roshcha»
Call-center project for coordination and countermeasures against HCV for persons with disabilities
Training center (coworking) for persons with disabilities
Shelter of permanent residence for persons with disabilities
Case management for solving various social issues of persons with disabilities (recovery of documents, accommodation in dormitories, treatment, etc.)
